info.title: Hackathon API
info.description: This an API for the Enza x Microsoft Hackathon 2025

get.summary: Function to compute adjusted entry means for one trait based on a single trial.
get.description:
This function calculates adjusted means for a specific trait within a single
                trial using a linear mixed-effects model. It accounts for random variation due to genotype and 
                replication, providing more accurate estimates of trait performance. The result is a table of
                adjusted means for each genotype, helping researchers compare entries while controlling for 
                experimental design effects.

parameters.name: trial

schema.description: Integer to specify the trial to analyse
schema.title: Trial

parameters.description: Integer to specify the trial to analyse

parameters.name: trait

schema.description: String to specify the trait to analyse
schema.title: Trait

parameters.description: String to specify the trait to analyse

200.description: Dataframe of adjusted means in single numeric column and GIDs as rownames

get.summary: Function to compute adjusted entry means for one trait based on multiple trials.
get.description:
This function calculates adjusted means for a specific trait for a list of
                trials using a linear mixed-effects model. It accounts for random variation due to genotype and 
                replication, providing more accurate estimates of trait performance. The result is a table of
                adjusted means for each genotype, helping researchers compare entries while controlling for 
                experimental design effects.

parameters.name: trials

schema.description: Integer vector to specify the trials to analyse
schema.title: Trials

parameters.description: Integer vector to specify the trials to analyse

parameters.name: trait

schema.description: String to specify the trait to analyse
schema.title: Trait

parameters.description: String to specify the trait to analyse

200.description: Dataframe of adjusted means in single numeric column and GIDs as rownames

get.summary: Function to compute heritability for one trait based on a single trial.
get.description:
This function estimates the broad-sense heritability (H²) of a 
                specific trait within a single trial using a linear mixed-effects model. It 
                partitions the observed variation into genetic variance (due to genotype differences)
                and residual variance (environmental or unexplained). The heritability is then 
                calculated as the ratio of genetic variance to total variance, providing a 
                measure of how much of the trait's variation is genetically determined. This
                  is useful for assessing the potential for genetic improvement through selection.

parameters.name: trial

schema.description: Integer to specify the trial to analyse
schema.title: Trial

parameters.description: Integer to specify the trial to analyse

parameters.name: trait

schema.description: String to specify the trait to analyse
schema.title: Trait

parameters.description: String to specify the trait to analyse

get.description:
This function estimates the broad-sense heritability (H²) of a 
                specific trait within a single trial using a linear mixed-effects model. It 
                partitions the observed variation into genetic variance (due to genotype differences)
                and residual variance (environmental or unexplained). The heritability is then 
                calculated as the ratio of genetic variance to total variance, providing a 
                measure of how much of the trait's variation is genetically determined. This
                  is useful for assessing the potential for genetic improvement through selection.

parameters.name: trials

schema.description: Integervector to specify the trials to analyse
schema.title: Trials
